coreAttributes.authorTag: The clothing's tag reads: 'Created by TonyJC, with implementation and editing by NeverLucky'
coreAttributes.name: spaghetti crop tank-top
coreAttributes.description: A cropped tank-top with spaghetti straps.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] through the top's straps as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc.her] head.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the top's straps as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms] through the top's straps as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] it down over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] top and straps back up, covering [npc.her] chest.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] T-shirt back down, covering [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] away [npc.her] straps and top down to hang loose, exposing [npc.her] chest.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] away [npc2.namePos] straps and top down to hang loose, exposing [npc2.her] chest.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(yank)] down [npc2.her] top, letting it hang loosely and exposing [npc2.her] chest.
